item.title: Our Service
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[ut_service_column color="#FDA527" icon="fa-cog" headline="Shortcodes" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="left" width="third" effect="fadeInUp" last="false"] Can make website design much easier and with our shortcode manager you can now create them even faster. Choose your desired shortcode and the manager will insert it for you.[/ut_service_column]
[ut_service_column color="#FDA527" icon="fa-code" headline="Clean Code" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="left" width="third" effect="fadeInUp" last="false"] Brooklyn has been built with the latest submission requirements based on the WordPres Codex, everything is working as intended. [/ut_service_column]
[ut_service_column color="#FDA527" icon="fa-archive" headline="Dummy Content" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="left" width="third" effect="fadeInUp" last="true"] Brooklyn contains our unique One Click Demo Importer for a quick and easy setup. No need to deal with XML files![/ut_service_column][ut_clear]
[ut_service_column color="#FDA527" icon="fa-columns" headline="One-Page or Multi-Page" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="left" width="third" effect="fadeInUp" last="false"] Brooklyn is mainly a one page theme, but you can easily turn it into a multi page WordPress theme and guess what? It only costs you $40 bucks! Updates and support included!.[/ut_service_column]
[ut_service_column color="#FDA527" icon="fa-picture-o" headline="Parallax Sections" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="left" width="third" effect="fadeInUp" last="false"] You can create as many sections as you like, with or without paralaxx, it's up to you! BROOKLYN does not limit your imagination,see our 8 demos.[/ut_service_column]
[ut_service_column color="#FDA527" icon="fa-road" headline="Section Backgrounds" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="left" width="third" effect="fadeInUp" last="true"] Brooklyn gives you the freedom to style each section individually. Easily change colors, images, content, fonts, margins and much more without the need to touch a single line of code.[/ut_service_column][ut_clear]
[ut_service_column color="#FDA527" icon="fa-text-width" headline="Section Header" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="left" width="third" effect="fadeInUp" last="false"] Brooklyn provides 7 different header styles out of the box. With the help of the built in section settings, you can easily style each section header individually.[/ut_service_column]
[ut_service_column color="#FDA527" icon="fa-sitemap" headline="Portfolio" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="left" width="third" effect="fadeInUp" last="false"] Present your work to the crowd, with our portfolio management you can easily create your own showcase so that everyone is able to find and see your work on the web! [/ut_service_column]
[ut_service_column color="#FDA527" icon="fa-comments-o" headline="Support" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="left" width="third" effect="fadeInUp" last="true"] We consider support as important as our theme development. If you need help, get all of your questions answered quickly with exclusive access to our dedicated support forum. We are delivering support from Monday to Friday. [/ut_service_column]
